New Records: Anthony Edwards recorded 33 points, eight rebounds, and six assists, setting up a key performance for the Timberwolves
Key Match Events: The Timberwolves rallied from a 13-point deficit to secure the win
A 12-0 run in the fourth quarter turned the game in Minnesota's favor
Edwards' two three-pointers in the final minutes sealed the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota shot 70.8% from the field in the fourth quarter
The Bulls struggled defensively in the fourth quarter, allowing the Timberwolves to take control
Others: The game marked the Bulls' fourth consecutive loss
The Timberwolves' victory moved them to a strong start in the 2024-25 season
